page_content: Discusses social assistance regulations in Zurich, focusing on behavioral changes required for receiving aid.
Discusses disciplinary regulations for middle schools in Zurich, including rules on absences and behavior.
Discusses the restructuring of the 9th school year in Zurich's public schools, focusing on competency profiles and career preparation.
Discusses an urgent inquiry regarding the waiver of the implementation of guidelines for the valuation of securities without a market value for the wealth tax as of January 1, 2009.
Provides information on reporting and approval requirements for activities involving genetically modified or pathogenic organisms, as well as emergency preparedness plans.
Discusses the procedures for obtaining official tax information and advance rulings from the cantonal tax office in Zurich.
Discusses the financial aspects of waste management in Zurich, including fees and statistics.
